properties.name: Laika Panorama Bar & Night Club
properties.note: One of the best views on Belgrade from rooftop terrace, and great place for afternoon and late night out

properties.description: A Cafe Bar as it once was popular in Belgrade. Loved by the locals. Nice interior design and very nice people hanging in this place. They mostly play House music, and DJ is present on weekends. Reservations are smart thing to do on Fridays and Saturdays.
properties.name: Ђура

properties.description: Ne ta dver – вински бар с српским винима. Аутентичност и квалитет који ће вас одвести на прави пут.
properties.name: Ne ta dver
